name: Tapu Koko Prism Star
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.

abilities.name: Dance of the Ancients
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon and attach a {L} Energy card from your discard pile to each of them. If you do, discard all cards from this Pokémon and put it in the Lost Zone.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
